name: Endless Furry Ping-Pong
description:
Welcome to Endless Furry Ping-Pong!
The 7th installment of the "Endless Furry" Series!
This game is a simple recreation (parody) of the classic Pong game, but with a furry twist!

Key Features:
1. Single Player vs AI.
2. Two Player PvP Local Splitscreen.
3. Partial Controller Support In Both Single And Two Player Mode.
4. Get Addicted To Furry Culture!
5. Steam Leaderboard!
6. Steam Achievements!
